article_title: THS one-act play aims for state title: ‘Buried Child’ offers edgy, intense drama
article_text:
Current Online Subscribers

If you have previously registered on tdtnews.com, and have a current online subscription you may login with your email and password. Online subscribers get access to all of the Temple Daily Telegram's online content, plus a digital replica of the print edition. Some third party content, including circulars may not be available online.

If you have questions regarding access, please contact circulation at tdtcir@tdtnews.com or 254-778-4444 between 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. Monday through Friday.

og.description: When the cast and crew of the Temple High School Theater Department take the stage for the University Interscholastic League Class 5A One-Act Play state championship on Wednesday, they will present Sam Shepard’s “Buried Child,” which is uncharted territory for high school theater groups.
